content:
Hi Community,
We need your input on several GitHub issues and this will help determine if the issue gets addressed or closed. If any of these issues are needed or apply to your community, leave a message directly in the issue (not here).

https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/8029 - supporting Zip, other
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10679 - thumbnail and guestbooks
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10639 - file level metadata, versioning, and DOIs
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/3193 - we need community members to test if this is still happening
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/8798 - we are looking for additional use cases

Please respond in the issue within the next two weeks - Thanks
